name: Divine Intervention
description: From the Creator came we all, and to the Creator we shall return, for life is a borrowed gift born of their divine breath.
effect: Followers of Arceus may call upon 'Divine Intervention' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, guaranteeing a High Critical on their moves until they benefit from the High Critical. (Critting only on two sixes) At Luminary, gain 2 uses of this boon. At Paragon, you may expend one use of this Boon when a Crit would be denied by an ability, status, move or item and cause the Crit to break through the thing stopping it. At High Priest(ess), you gain a 3rd use of this boon.
